Post.title: hexo
Post._content:
# 
*categories**tags**about*:
```
 $hexo new page categories
 $hexo new page tags
 $hexo new page about
```
 *hexo*  *_config.yml*  *post_asset_folder* true, *themes/nexT/_config.yml* :
```
menu:
  home: /
  categories: /categories
  about: /about
  archives: /archives
  tags: /tags
  #sitemap: /sitemap.xml
  #commonweal: /404.html
```
<!--more-->
# 
 
```
 $hexo new post ""  hexo n ""
```
 *hexo\source\_posts**.md*:
```
   <!--more-->
```
 **
```
 $hexo g //
 $hexo d //
```
# RSS
 RSS
```
 $npm install hexo-generator-feed --save
```
 *hexo\_config.yml*:
```
 feed:
  type: atom
  path: atom.xml
  limit: 20
```
 *themesnexT/_config.yml*
```
 rss: /atom.xml
```
# sitemap
 *sitemap*:
```
 $npm install hexo-generator-sitemap --save
```
 *hexo/_config.yml*:
```
 sitemap:
path: sitemap.xml
```
# 
 *themes/nexT/_config.yml*
```
 social:
   Github: https://github.com/stevenshichina
```
# 
 *hexo-generator-serarch*
```
 $npm install hexo-generator-search --save
```
 *hexo/_config.yml*:
```
 search:
  path: search.xml
  field: post
```
# 
 hexo/source/images*themes/nexT/_config.yml*
```
 avatar: /images/avatar.jpg
```
# 
 [Custom QR Code Generator](https://www.unitag.io/qrcode)

Post.title: hexo+github
Post._content:
# 
*hexo**Node.js*Markdown

# 
*windows10 64bits*
# 
1. [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/ "Java Script")Chrome V8JavaScript
2. [Git-for-windows](https://github.com/git-for-windows/git/releases "git for windows")windowsgit 
3. [MarkdownPad](http://markdownpad.com/ "markdown Editor for Windows")

* [github](www.github.com) username.github.iohttps://github.com/username/username.github.io  username*
# hexo
 *F:\github\hexo**Git Bash Here*,*git for windows* [hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/ "hexo")
```
$npm install hexo-cli -g //: -g
$npm install hexo-server -g // hexo3.0server,
```
*hexo*
```
$hexo -v
```
<!--more-->
 *hexo**_config.yml*[hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/ "hexo")
## hexo
hexohexo
```
$hexo g //hexo generate,
$hexo s //hexo server,
$hexo d //hexo deploy,github
```

## 
*F:\github\hexo*,
```
$hexo init //
$npm install //
$hexo g //
$hexo s //
```
localhost:4000![Alt text](hexo-blog/hello-world.jpg)
## github
hexo_config.yml[MarkdownPad](http://markdownpad.com/ "markdown Editor for Windows") deploygithub
```
deploy:
type: git //':'
repository: https://github.com/username/username.github.io.git
branch: master
```
### SSH Key
 *Git Bash Here*,SSH Key:
```
 $ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your_email@youremail.com"
```
 
 *c:/user/username/.ssh/*id_rsaid_rsa.pubid_rsa.pub[github](https://github.com/login),*setting*,*SSH and GPG keys**New SSH**title*key*Git bash*:
```
 $ssh -T git@github.com
```
### 
```
 $git config --global user.name "your username"  
 $git config --global user.email "your_email@youremail.com"
```

```
$hexo clean //db.jsonpublic
$hexo g //
$hexo d //github
```
*hexo d*git
```
$npm install hexo-deployer-git -g
```

  *hexo d*github
  *https://github.com/username/username.github.io*
: username.
# nexT
hexolandscapehexo/themes/[nexT](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/) F:\github\hexoGit Bash Here:
```
$git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next.git themes/nexT
```
nexTthemeshexo_config.yml:
```
# Extensions
## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/
## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/
theme: nexT
```
nexTSchemenexT
F:\github\hexo\themes\nexT:
```
# Schemes
#scheme: Muse //Scheme
#scheme: Mist //
scheme: Pisces //
```
: [nexT](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/getting-started.html)
## 
hexoF:\github\hexo\_config.yml:
```
language: zh-Hans //
```
# 
### 
 [leancloud](https://leancloud.cn) :![Alt-text](hexo-blog/leancloudc.jpg)

CounterclassAppIDAppKeynexT_config.yml:
```
# Show number of visitors to each article.
# You can visit https://leancloud.cn get AppID and AppKey.
leancloud_visitors:
  enable: true
  app_id: #<app_id> //AppID
  app_key: #<app_key> //AppKey
```
->web
### 
 [](http://ibruce.info/2015/04/04/busuanzi/) 
themes\nexT\layout\_partialsfooter.swig:
```
<script async src="//dn-lbstatics.qbox.me/busuanzi/2.3/busuanzi.pure.mini.js">
</script>
```

```
$npm install hexo-cli -g //: -g
```

## 
hexoF:\github\hexo\_config.yml:

# 
### 
 [leancloud](https://leancloud.cn) :![Alt-text](hexo-blog/leancloudc.jpg)

CounterclassAppIDAppKeynexT_config.yml:
```
# Show number of visitors to each article.
# You can visit https://leancloud.cn get AppID and AppKey.
leancloud_visitors:
  enable: true
  app_id: #<app_id> //AppID
  app_key: #<app_key> //AppKey
```

->web

Post.title: hexo
Post._content:
# 
hexogithub;hexo

tarhexo;pushgithub,gitpushgithub
# 
githubmasterusernameusername.github.iomasterhexohexohexohexopushhexo;
## 
*github\hexo*,
```
$git remote -v
```
username.github.io
```
$git remote rm origin
```

```
$git remote add origin https://github.com/yourusername/yourusername.github.io.git
$git init 
```
<!--more-->
*theme\nexT**.git*nexTnexThexo_config.yml
```
$git add --all //add*git status*
$git commit -m "backup hexo"
*$git config --global user.name "yourusername" //*
*$git config --global user.email "yourusername@xxx.com"*
$git push origin hexo //pushhexo
```
username.github.iomaster,hexohexopublicusername.github.iomasterhexo.gitignore
```
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
*.log
node_modules/
public/
.deploy*/
```
.gitignore.gitignore.gitignore
```
$git rm -r --cached .
$git add --all
$git commit -m "update .gitignore"
```

## 
username.github.iohexo,
*F:\github\home*hexo
```
$git clone https://github.com/username/username.github.io.git
```
username.github.io
```
$git branch -r
```

```
*origin/HEAD -> origin/master*
*origin/hexo*
*origin/master*
```
master,hexohexohexo
```
$git fetch origin hexo:hexo
```
hexo
```
$git checkout hexo
```
pushhexo
*git pull*
```
$git pull
$hexo n post "new blog"
$hexo clean
$hexo g
$hexo d
$git commit -m "add new blog"
$git push origin hexo
```
